name: Reventure OST
detailed_description:
Original Soundtrack for "Reventure", makes your ears happy.

Themes included:

1. Main Theme 00:22
2. The Collector 01:01
3. New Day 00:10
4. Royal Kingdom 00:48
5. Time for Adventure! 02:52
6. Hot Volcano 01:00
7. Piranha Love 01:00
8. Floody Mountain 00:49
9. Dark Fortress 01:48
10. Lord of Darkness 01:55
11. Behind the Door 00:40
12. Pirate's Cliff 02:01
13. Ridiculous Desert 01:14
14. Unexpected End 00:42
15. Reventure 00:33

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MP3 Player
  • Processor: Yes
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Not so good as the game ones
  • Storage: 171 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: The greatest OST for the greatest game
